To use the EventConnect App, you must first log in using the following steps:
1. Tap on the EventConnect icon to launch the app.
2. Tap on the email entry box and enter your email, which must contain the @ symbol and end with “.com” or “.edu”.
3. Tap on the password entry box and enter a password that is at least 5 characters long.
4. Click on the “Event Connect” button to log in. Good job! You are now in the EventConnect app.

EventConnect has three main tabs: Potential Events, Confirmed Events, and My Events. My Events contains the events that the current user is hosting or has indicated interest in. The Potential Events and Confirmed Events tabs sort events as either potential or confirmed.

All EventConnect events start out as potential events, which become confirmed if enough people decide to attend. Only the event host knows how many people need to come to confirm an event. A guest can tell whether an event is confirmed by finding out which tab the event is in.
To find out if an event is confirmed, follow these steps:
1. Look for the event in the Confirmed Events tab. If the event is there, it has been confirmed!

2. Look for the event in the Potential Events tab if you did not find it in the Confirmed Events tab. If there, the event is still considered potential. If the event is not in the Potential Events tab, the event has been deleted.
One key feature of the application is the ability to create new events.
To create a new event, follow these steps:
1. Press the floating plus button at the bottom right of the app.
2. Add your name as the host of the event.
3. Write a title for your event in the title line.
4. Enter the event date by pressing the date line, selecting a date from the calendar widget.
5. Enter the event time by pressing the time line, selecting a time from the clock widget.
6. Enter the event cost in the cost line. You can leave this field blank if there is no cost, or you can put a 0 in the blank.
7. Enter the minimum number of people you need to attend in the threshold line.
8. Enter the maximum number of people you can host in the capacity line.
9. Choose a category for the event from the category spinner.
10. Add a short description of the event in the description line.
11. Press the Create Event button to add your event.
To remove interest in an event you previously indicated interest for, follow these steps:
1. Find the event you previously indicated interest in in one of the tabs.

Note: If the event was in the “Potential Events” tab when you indicated your interest, it may have become confirmed since that time, in which case it will be found in the “Confirmed Events” tab instead.
2. Tap the button with the text “Uninterested?” to mark you are no longer interested in the event.
3. The text on the button will read “Interested?” to show that your choice has been saved.

Note: If the interest threshold is no longer met for an event in the “Confirmed Events” tab, it will be moved to the “Potential Events” tab to indicate the event is no longer confirmed. If this happens you will see a message to let you know.
To delete an event you are created but no longer wish to host, follow these steps:
1. Find the event in one of the tabs. The event might be easiest to find in the My Events tab.
2. Tap the three dot menu in the corner of the event card. Select "Delete" from the menu that pops up.
3. On the pop-up that appears, tap "Delete" to confirm deletion. You can also cancel deletion at this point if you change your mind by tapping "Cancel".
